title: SOLD - lot of 18 T205 Gold Border w/ SP
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD - lot of 18 T205 Gold Border w/ SP
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a lot of 18 T205 Piedmont commons.   All are in Poor to Good condition, none of which have been trimmed or altered (unless you consider the writing all over the front of the Beck an alteration)!

Looking for $XXX for the lot, which works out to $XX.XX a card + a little for shipping.  I would prefer to not break up the lot, so please don't ask unless you are making a strong offer on a specific card.

The lot does include a few key cards, including Hal Chase, Robert Harmon (left ear shows), and George Mullin.

All will be shipped in top loaders (w/ penny sleeves).  First to PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] will be the new owner.

See scans below for condition or ask me if you need any details.

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_4.jpg[/img][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_4_back.jpg[/img]
[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_5.jpg[/img][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_5_back.jpg[/img]
Thanks Taylor!  The lot has been sold!
